resources.string: We hope that you are enjoying our app! Can you please spare a moment to give us a 5 star review?
We would really appreciate your support of a 5 star rating on the Android Market (last time we bug you, promise)! Can you please rate us 5 stars now on Google Play?
Remove Ads and get more levels!
Have you considered the full version of our app? On top of supporting us, you will get an Ads-free version with many more levels of different sizes! Are you ready now to preview the full version?
